name: Embrace capitalism
description:
People see a dungon, you see an opportunity.

Build a tavern ! Build a market !

Attrack the unpaid laborer adventurer with houses, food and promess of a job.

Use contracts to get by ! Realise you sold all your food for 5g !

Realise you fucked up and now you have no food ! Restart rebuilding anyways.


Welcome to The Tavern, Embrace capitalism™ edition.
